page.title: 08TYPES OF HOUSES.
page.content:
There are several types of houses on the Glebe estate,which was begun in 1969. These are 2 & 3 bedroomed bungalows, 3 & 4 bedroomed semi _ detached houses and a few 3 & 4 bedroomed detached houses. The houses and bungalows are brick-built with tiled roofs.Nearly all of them have garages.There are some flats with flat felt roofs.Most houses have central heating and front and rear gardens. The houses are owner-occupied and the flats are council owned. From 1969, when the estate was begun, house prices have increased dramatically.
Average price in 1969--- Â£4062 Average price in 1985--- Â£26000
